subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Arizona State has begun an investigation into accusations of academic fraud and recruiting violations in its baseball program. The former player and team manager Mikel Moreno told The East Valley Tribune that he made the allegations to university officials, who began the investigation. Virgil Renzulli, the university’s vice president for public affairs, confirmed that an investigation had started.
